classes.name: VumBaseline
classes.description: A baseline contains a collection of one or more patches, extensions, service packs, or bug fixes.

classes.name: VumBaselineGroup
classes.description: A baseline group contains a collection of one or more baselines.

classes.name: VumBaselineSearchSpec
classes.description: A baseline search criteria for the Update Manager plug-in.

methods.name: setBaselineTypesByStringArray
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set BaselineType from a string value

methods.name: setTargetTypesByStringArray
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set a target type from a string value

methods.name: setContentTypesByStringArray
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set a content type from a string value

classes.name: VumGuestRemediationOption
classes.description: Configuration for a virtual machine remediation task.

classes.name: VumHost
classes.description: This object represents a vCenter Server system with which an Update Manager instance is registered.

classes.name: VumHostRemediationOption
classes.description: Configuration for a host remediation task.

methods.name: getDefaultVumHost
methods.description: Returns the default Update Manager host.

methods.name: getBaselines
methods.description:
Retrieves the baselines specified by the provided parameters. There are two default dynamic patch baselines
(Critical Host Patches (Predefined) and Non-Critical Host Patches (Predefined)) and three upgrade baselines
(VMware Tools Upgrade to Match Host (Predefined), VM Hardware Upgrade to Match Host (Predefined),
and VA Upgrade to Latest (Predefined)). You cannot edit or delete the default baselines.

methods.name: getAllBaselineGroups
methods.description: Retrieves the baseline groups.

methods.name: getEulasContent
methods.description: Get EULA content related for the provided array of baselines.

methods.name: getVirtualApplianceBaselines
methods.description: Filter baselines and return only those that are related to a Virtual Appliance update.

methods.name: acceptAllEulaContracts
methods.description: Accept all software update EULAs for specified virtual appliance related baselines.

methods.name: getVumUri
methods.description:
Get the Update Manager URL assigned to the vCenter Server instance.
Returns null if there is no Update Manager instance assigned to vCenter Server.
The method throws an exception if there is no vCenter Server instance at the specified URL.

methods.name: getVumHosts
methods.description: Retrieves the registered vCenter Server instances with extensions from the Update Manager plug-in configuration.

methods.name: getVumHostsURLs
methods.description: Retrieves the URL of registered vCenter Server instances with extensions from the Update Manager plug-in configuration.

methods.name: getFilteredBaselines
methods.description: Retrieves the baselines specified by the provided parameters.

methods.name: getPatches
methods.parameters: vcUri: string, spec: VumPatchSearchSpec, patchIds: number[], baselineIds: number[], bundleType: string[], installationImpact: string[]
methods.description: Retrieves patches specified by the provided parameters.

methods.name: changeDefaultServerTo
methods.description: Set default the default vCenter Server instance with assigned Update Manager server.

methods.name: registerVcenterWithVum
methods.description: Register a vCenter Server instance with assigned Update Manager server.

methods.name: getDefaultVcUri
methods.description: Utility method returning the default vCenter Server URI for the plug-in as set from its configuration.

methods.name: getVcServerUri
methods.description: Return a list of vCenter Server instances set in the plug-in configuration

methods.name: createPatchBaseline
methods.parameters: vcUri: string, name: string, desciption: string, contentType: string, targetType: string, includePatch: VumPatchInfo[], excludePatch: VumPatchInfo[], isExtension: boolean, searchSpec: VumPatchSearchSpec
methods.description:
Creates a new patch baseline. Patch baselines can be applied to hosts or virtual machines.
Depending on the patch criteria you select, patch baselines can be either dynamic or static (fixed).
You can specify the patches that you want to include in the baseline by using the includePatch parameter.
You can also use the searchSpec attribute to filter the patches that you want to include in a baseline.
You can filter patches by their properties, such as product, vendor, severity, and release date.
The patches that have been excluded by using the excludePatch parameter will never be included
even if they correspond to the filter defined by the searchSpec attribute.

methods.name: getEntities
methods.description: Connect to a vCenter Server and retrieve all entities from it.

methods.name: attachBaselines
methods.description:
Attaches baselines to a vSphere object that you select.
The object can be a template, virtual machine, vApp, ESX/ESXi host, folder, cluster, or a datacenter.
Attaching a baseline to a container object such as a folder or datacenter transitively attaches the baseline to all objects in the container.

methods.name: detachBaselines
methods.description: Detaches baselines from the specified vSphere objects. To detach inherited baselines, you must detach them from the parent object.

methods.name: getPatchProducts
methods.description: Utility method to retrieve all patch products.

methods.name: getPatchLanguages
methods.description: Utility method to retrieve all patch languages.

methods.name: getPatchVendors
methods.description: Utility method to retrieve all patch vendors.

methods.name: getBundleTypes
methods.description: Utility method to retrieve all bundle types.

methods.name: getPatchInstallationImpacts
methods.description: Utility method to retrieve the installation impacts of all patches.

methods.name: deleteBaseline
methods.description: Deletes the specified baseline. Before the removal, the baseline is detached from all objects it has been attached to.

methods.name: deleteBaselines
methods.description: Deletes the specified baselines. Before the removal, the baselines are detached from all objects they have been attached to.

methods.name: downloadPatchesByLanguages
methods.description: Checks for new patches and depending on the availability downloads them to the Update Manager repository.

methods.name: downloadPatchesByLanguagesAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously checks for new patches and depending on the availability downloads them to the Update Manager repository.

methods.name: createTrigger
methods.description: Creates a trigger used by the asynchronous workflows.

methods.name: updatePatchBaseline
methods.description: Modifies the properties of a patch baseline.

methods.name: scanInventory
methods.description:
Scans vSphere objects against patches included in the baselines attached to them.
The object can be a template, virtual machine, vApp, ESX/ESXi host, folder, cluster, or a datacenter.
If the objects are of different types, the method starts a separate vCenter Server task for each object.

methods.name: getCompliance
methods.parameters: entities: VumVIInventory[], complianceStatus: string, baselines: VumBaseline[]
methods.description:
Retrieve baseline compliance data for the specified vSphere object of type template, virtual machine,
vApp, ESX/ESXi host, folder, cluster, or a datacenter.
The method returns information about the compliance of the specified object against the baselines that are attached to it.
If the object is a container, the cmdlet returns compliance data for all objects in the container.

methods.name: stage
methods.parameters: entities: VumVIInventory[], baselines: VumBaseline[], patches: VumPatchInfo[]
methods.description:
Stages patches. Staging allows you to download patches from the Update Manager server to the ESX/ESXi hosts,
without applying the patches immediately. You can stage patches to hosts or container objects such as clusters or datacenters.

methods.name: stageAsync
methods.parameters: entities: VumVIInventory[], baselines: VumBaseline[], patches: VumPatchInfo[]
methods.description:
Stages patches. Staging allows you to download patches from the Update Manager server to the ESX/ESXi hosts,
without applying the patches immediately. You can stage patches to hosts or container objects such as clusters or datacenters.
The method returns array with task keys for all of the started vCenter Server tasks.

methods.name: remediate
methods.parameters: entities: VumVIInventory[], baselines: VumBaseline[], excludedPatches: VumPatchInfo[], guestOption: VumGuestRemediationOption, hostOption: VumHostRemediationOption
methods.description:
Remediates an inventory object against the specified baselines.
You can remediate a template, virtual machine, vApp, ESX/ESXi host, folder, cluster, or a datacenter.

methods.name: remediateAsync
methods.parameters: entities: VumVIInventory[], baselines: VumBaseline[], excludedPatches: VumPatchInfo[], guestOption: VumGuestRemediationOption, hostOption: VumHostRemediationOption
methods.description:
Remediates an inventory object against the specified baselines. Returns an array of vCenter Server task keys.
You can remediate a template, virtual machine, vApp, ESX/ESXi host, folder, cluster, or a datacenter.

methods.name: exportBaselines
methods.description: Export baselines in .xml format.

methods.name: importBaselines
methods.description: Import baselines from .xml that you have generated by using exportBaselines.

methods.name: exportCompliance
methods.parameters: compliances: VumCompliance[], format: any, serverOutFile: string
methods.description: Export Compliance report to external file.

methods.name: formatAsVumObject
methods.parameters: vcObject: string, schema: string, port: number
methods.description: Format a finder (dunesUri) from the vSphere plug-in as VIInventory finder.

methods.name: validateTriggerSuccess
methods.description: Validates final state of a trigger. Should be called after the trigger is fired.

methods.name: getEntitiesByBaselineGroup
methods.description: Retrieves the vCenter Server entities to which these baseline groups are attached.

methods.name: getEntitiesByBaseline
methods.description: Retrieves the vCenter Server entities to which these baselines are attached

classes.name: VumPatch
classes.description: Container object containing specific information and details about a patch.

methods.name: setContentTypeFromString
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set content type from string value.

classes.name: VumPatchDetail
classes.description: A patch detail from the Update Manager plug-in.

classes.name: VumPatchSearchSpec
classes.description: A patch search criteria for the Update Manager plug-in.

methods.name: setSeverityFromStrings
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set severity from a string value.

methods.name: setTargetTypeFromStrings
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set a target type from a string value.

methods.name: setUpdateTypeFromStrings
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set an update type from string value.

methods.name: setHostUpdateCategoryFromStrings
methods.description: Utility method to parse and set an host update category from string value.

classes.name: VumVIInventory
classes.description: Represents a vSphere object used in the Update Manager plug-in.
